name: zenithhighlight
description: - The historian is an app that takes you back in time to shift across time periods and learn about their most significant events and conflicts that shaped our modern life. - This application will host and describe various conflicts that occured during the 20th. We hope to inform later generations of little-known wars. In addition, this application will allow user/survivor/veteran input to help "narrate" the timeline.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
